content.detailedDescription: I was on guard duty at fort benning ga. we observed a bright disk i would estimate from 175 to 200 feet across it was no more then 500 feet in the air made a low pitch humming noise. it passed almost directly overhead we seen it just a few minutes because it was not very high..When we were picked up at the end of our tour we told the officer what we observed a short while later we were warned not to document or say anything about what we observed or we would be transfered to a high risk station where the chances were high we would not get home. the other guard who was with me was so nervous he crawled under a truck and stayed there until the object was out of sight. i don't remember exact dates i remember we were guarding a fuel depot during the fuel shortage 1972--73. we were armed..I also remember the name of the other guard..It has always bothered me that we were threatened and i do believe it would not of went well if i had persued it so i kept quiet..Helecopter gun ships passed by a few minutes later i have no idea of the outcome of their persuit....Dave
content.summary: Large disk very bright but i could not see the source of light

content.detailedDescription: Multiple experiences over approximately a two year period. always right after i fell asleep. there was always a paralysis that i fought. often there were bluish lights on my ceiling. most of the experiences ended when i was able to fight off the paralysis. one experience included a puncture in my back which i would equate with a medical instrument. i felt the minor pain of a pinch and had a pimple like mark for a few days. they were always behind me during the encounters. on one occasion they successfully removed me from my home and i was taken aboard a craft that was hovering in the courtyard in front of my house. i remember being placed in a geleatonous cylindrical vat from the bottom. the next thing i remember is waking up in my bed 14 hours later and completely exhausted. the experiences were very frequent until the successful removal from my home. that was october 2012. i have had a few seemingly random infrequent experiences since then.
content.summary: Multiple visitations in my house where unsuccessful attempts were made to remove me from my home. one successful attempt where i was taken on a craft and one experience with some sort of medical drill in my back

content.detailedDescription:
I was just a young boy.  around 4 or 5 years old.  i have five sisters and one older brother.  we were all in the back yard playing because it was just getting dark.  it was just the beginning of summertime, so mom would let us play outside until bedtime.  my mother had a friend over and was drinking coffee at the table with her.  my older brother was the first to see this craft in the sky, and then my sisters all ran over.  i was always apprehensive and shy as a kid, so i took my time going over there to where my siblings were.  when i got there i saw this craft in the air.  it was silver in color and had a very small dome on top.  it was circular in shape and had blue and white lights at the bottom with a dark center.  i could tell at some points that there were windows in the craft around the small dome.  i wanted to be close to my older brother, so he let me hold onto his pant leg.  that is when we heard all the commotion from the front of the house, all the neighbors were coming out onto the street and staring at this craft.  my brother ran into the house and got binoculars to stare at this thing.  he came to the small wooden fence and sat on top.  i wanted to be with him.  so he let me sit on his lap and even one time put the binoculars in my face so i could see the craft.  the craft just hovered for a while and then it shot straight up.  we never saw any other airplane or helicopter in the air, and were never approached by any authorities.  i'm not sure if anything was in the paper.  
a few nights later, my mother was upset with me because i had eaten children's aspirin, because i thought it was candy.  she made me drink a lot of milk.  for my punishment i had to sleep in the back yard all by myself.  she locked the back door so that i couldn't get in.  i went to the side of the house that was furthest from the field of weeds that lined the other side of the house.  i crouched down by all our bikes piled up against the house.  i was in a fetal position when i noticed the first creature.  it was about two feet tall and had a lot of hair all over it's body.  i couldn't understand what it was saying, but i somehow knew that it was peaceful.  it approached me and put it's hand on my head.  then i saw four more coming toward me.  and that is the last thing i remember.  i woke up the next morning in my bed.  my mother was furious, because she couldn't understand how i got into the house.  
all my life, i have had sleep paralysis, flying dreams, fears of little people, and odd scars that appear on my body.  only recently was i able to get a few pictures of what was visiting me at night.  i have always suffered from insomnia, and these pictures are not helping me get any sleep soon.
content.summary: I was four/five when my whole community saw this craft.  we all ran out of our homes and watched it in the skies.  i remember my older brother and i on top of the fence looking at it.

content.detailedDescription: I had just walked out onto my front porch, trying to cool off from the hot temperature inside my house, and standing where the driveway meets the porch, i noticed 6 spheres or orb like objects traveling from the northwest, headed somewhat towards the book cliffs. when they got over east carbon, they just blinked out, like as if someone was turning off a light switch. there were 3 large white translucent looking or somewhat glowing spheres in a row, with 3 much smaller ones following them from below, in a triangular formation. i have seen small planes and helicopters fly over this area many times and these 6 objects was traveling much faster than any plane or helicopter that i have seen. these spheres or orbs looked very solid and traveled in a straight line, nor did they pulsate or change direction. i have seen these spheres many times before in the past and thought it would be a good idea to start reporting them.
content.summary: Standing on my porch, 6 spheres, 3 large and 3 smaller ones traveling southeast over east carbon, then all 6 disappears

content.detailedDescription: I was little at the time picking up my sister from her house with my mother. on our way home we saw a cigar shaped object with black windows traveling just above a few large buildings along the highway. we all thought it was a ufo from the beginning and my mother tryed to follow it. after about ten minutes it went behind a building never to come out on the other side like it disappeared.
content.summary: Traveling along highway with mother and sister following ufo

content.detailedDescription: I saw the  ship up in the stars and then i saw them fly off at a right angle to their previous flight pattern.
content.summary: I saw the  ship up in the stars and then i saw them fly off at a right angle to their previous flight pattern.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home when a small/medium blue light came right over the top of me and jetted off in front of me. it was about a mile in front of me when it jetted back off into another direction.
content.summary: It was a small/medium blue light that went right over me while i was driving

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were taking the dogs out to use the bathroom before bed, we  
stept out onto the porch, i looked up and there it was going south east . it was so bright and there no blinking lights or sound,we both stood there astonished by what we were seeing it wasmoving fast,and then i swear on my life it just vanashed.For gods sake if anyone will belive us please let it be you,we are not crazy, but seeing this large object just dissipear is just madding.
content.summary: Black tryangle with bright white glow then it litterly disappeared swear on my life.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were taking the dogs out to use the bathroom before bed, we  
stept out onto the porch, i looked up and there it was going south east . it was so bright and there no blinking lights or sound,we both stood there astonished by what we were seeing it wasmoving fast,and then i swear on my life it just vanashed.For gods sake if anyone will belive us please let it be you,we are not crazy, but seeing this large object just dissipear is just madding.
content.summary: Black tryangle with bright white glow then it litterly disappeared swear on my life.

content.detailedDescription: Fast mover! dull silver light trans versed the entire night sky in less than 5 seconds. i started counting as soon as i saw it and it was gone before i hit four. in town trees, houses prevent me from seeing either horizon but man was it cooking!I was outside observing what i believe was a rather unique triangle configuration of the crescent moon, jupiter and venus in the western sky and saw a dim light moving from west/northwest to east/northeast at incredible speed. no blinking lights or other markers. commercial and military planes flying in the area but they appear as lumbering beasts compared to this thing. it appeared to be well inside the atmosphere my guess is 15-25 thousand feet, definitely not a satellite as i observe those going over the house on a clear night as a speck of light moving at the limit of my vision taking 20 to 30 seconds to move out of sight. i see similar lights occasionally when i am taking the trash out late at night and don't usually report them. if these things are ours then we must have really advanced and the public doesn't have a clue. with dyess air force base here i see military jets, helicopters and b-1s day and night but this was nothing like that. completely silent, no engine noise after it passed had to be moving at least 5-7k mph my guess is much faster. no reaction from any aircraft in the area, this must be my 20th sighting in so many years of this same type of aircraft. on a previous sighting a similar object passed in front of a bright full moon and i was able to see a silhouette of a diamond or bell shaped multi-faceted something? i don't have a clue what this thing is but it was an amazing and humbling experience. i snapped a cell phone photo but with an iphone 4 it just doesn't show up it barely registers the crescent moon.
content.summary: Fast mover! dull silver light

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside with my friends and looked up and saw the ufo as i previously described. i was immediately shocked and ran to see where it went.  the ufo did not appear again and i searched for common objects such as a ball or frisbee or plane. i was amazed and so happy while also being terrified. it flew over a building and i lost sight, i consider myself lucky for the experience.
content.summary: Looked up and an oval like light with three additional circle lights on it appeared, hovered, and then shot off very fast

content.detailedDescription: We spent the day at our farm in leslie, arkansas working. when we were leaving i took a picture of our house from the road with my iphone 4s. i took the picture at 4:32p.M. at the time of taking the photo we did not see a ufo or was we looking for one. later that night after i uploaded the photo to my desktop i noticed the clouds looked funny and then noticed a black spot in the upper left hand corner of the photo. after zooming in we noticed it was a saucer shaped object. i did not edit this photo in any way whatsoever! i have the original on my phone and the properties on the photo tell all the information about it. when it was taken, what camera it was taken from etc. i am attaching 3 photos. 1st will be the original image, 2nd will be it circled where it is in the sky and 3rd will be zoomed in.
content.summary: Took a picture of a saucer ufo in leslie, ar

content.detailedDescription: Two friends of mine and myself witnessed what appeared to be a large metallic top with glowing colored ports or lights slowly rotating as it hovered over what we only knew at the time as a building with all the windows boarded up. we saw the craft during recess while we were playing near the edge of a large area surrounded by oak trees. we noticed the object because it was obviously out of the norm to see something hover above a building in broad daylight. we immediately knew the object was a craft of some kind but amazing as it was to see it seemed non-threatening. the three of us ran to get a teacher as we were all in the 3rd grade at the time but by the time we returned from a fruitless attempt to get someone to come see what we saw it was gone. since that time i've learned that building is/was a masonic lodge which we knew nothing about at the time. the craft appeared to have a dull grey exterior with what looked like a dome on top and a pointed lower structure. i'm not sure if it's related but since a young age, aprox 5yrs old up to late teenage and early 20s, i've seen a vision of what seem like yellow luminescent "cat eyes" in a circle seemingly looking down at me in a pitch black background every time i would close my eyes tightly, it was almost like a recurring nightmare that would happen anytime not only at night. like i said i'm not sure it's in any way related and hasn't happened in 10 or so yrs but if it was an event that actually happend it made a long lasting impression. i've always felt very talented and special to some degree, despite my background i have always been a step ahead in all things mechanical and had knowledge of the inner workings of things that i should have no understanding of. for example i'm currently developing plans for a fusion reactor, and i only mention this as a way to say i'm not just some dumb hillbilly, i consider myself an intelligent individual. i'm sorry it's taken so long to make a report but it's something i've kept to myself because of fear of ridicule and lack of a proper outlet such as this.
content.summary: Like a children's top slowly rotating above building then gone apparently straight up

content.detailedDescription:
My son came into the house saying there was a ufo outside of our house. he was with a friend outside playing basketball.
my wife and i went outside and witnessed two orange orbs flying to the northeast. they kept equal distance between themselves and one disappeared before the other. they were wobbling a little as they moved.
content.summary: Two orange orbs flight path north east

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking the dogs out to potty. i noticed a bright light just above my head. i thought that's out of place for the time of year and month.  so, i started to stare at it.  thinking it was to big for a planet and 
trying to figure out what was happening. it started moving in a se direction at a very slow speed not making a noticable sound.  i went in the house to call for my wife to come see it but it vanished when i returned.    
it was clear outside and there was still plenty of sky left for it to travel in.
content.summary: Thought i was looking at a plantet that was larger and out of place then it started to move se direction with no sound at slow speed.

content.detailedDescription: Sometime after eating diner me at age 7, my cousin age 7, my sister age 9, and my sisters childhood friend/ neighbor age 8 were outside the front of my cousins house playing tag when one of us (i'm not sure which spotted it first) looked up and pointed. what i remember was a cigar shaped craft with lights  on the bottom. it didn't move, it just sat there like a parked car. no noise came from it, i felt it was watching us. the only thing i can remembering us saying to one another was, what is it? this was the city of boca raton, fl 1978 and where the house was located to the west was a lake and railroad tracks. the ufo was probably about  4 to 500 feet above the railroad tracks. before we knew what was going on in the blink of an eye it took off se. we all ran in the direction it went which took us trough the house and into the backyard. i remember the house full of adults sitting around having coffee and talking. when we stormed through the house yelling and excited ( not scared) our parents jumped up asking what was going on, we told them and as you can imagine the laughter ensued. who was going to believe us, we were just young kids. the only evidence was a green trail left behind which showed the direction that it went. i always look up at night hoping to see something again but it's been almost 40 years now and no luck so far.
content.summary: The craft hovered in one spot for somewhere between 60 to 100 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: On my way to work and noticed a strange cloud formation took this picture with my camera phone. later i noticed this light in the top left part of picture.
content.summary: Unsual cloud formation so i took pic with my camera phone.  later saw light in the top left part of picture.

content.detailedDescription:
The year was 1967 and i was 18 years old, living in a suburb of nashville. 
on september the eight, between six and six-thirty, i went to the church i attended to help distribute religious pamphlets to the community. the elder of the church, a man i’ll refer to as g. s. was there along with a deacon, h. g. and another man from a nearby church whom i didn’t know. they were all in their forties or maybe early fifties. we got into the elder’s new ford and rode to a nearby sub-division that had been recently built in the community. g. s. parked along the side of county hospital road, across from a big open field.
when i stepped out, i glanced across the field and saw a large metallic ufo hovering above a big oak tree. this ufo was as large as my parent’s modest house. it had orange and green lights along the outer rim of the saucer shaped craft and was completely silent. 
this occurred in broad daylight. the sun wouldn’t go down for another hour and a half or so. and we were close; so close i could have reached down, grabbed a rock and hit it if i’d had the urge to throw one. the others had noticed it too and the four of us stood along the side of the road, our eyes riveted on the ufo. there wasn’t a lot of traffic around but a few cars drove by us. yet none of them must have noticed because i don’t recall anyone else pulling over and getting out to look.
we stood watching for about fifteen minutes. but nothing about the craft changed. it seems to me that the craft was spinning ever so slowly but that could have been an embellishment my subconscious has added over time. in any event, i’d have to say watching it became a bit monotonous until i’d remind myself i was across the street from an actual ufo. and i’d feel that spark of excitement i’d felt upon first seeing it.
but g. s. must have really become bored—or else, who knows, maybe he thought the devil was trying to distract us from handing out pamphlets—because he suddenly announced we needed to start knocking on doors. i couldn’t believe him. i had the urge to point at the ufo and say, “are you mad? that’s a flying saucer!”
but i was a nice young kid who’d been brought up to obey my elders so, as unbelievable as it seems to me now, i did as i was told. all four of us started marching up walkways to houses to knock and hand out pamphlets. i stumbled along, most of my attention on the ufo down the street. i knocked on one door and when the man answered, i pushed a pamphlet in his hands and turned back to point out the ufo, but it was gone. there one second and gone two seconds later. just vanished.
the odd thing is that the previous night i’d been listening to the radio and a woman had called the deejay describing the exact same craft i saw the following day. the deejay had made fun of her and i had laughed, thinking she’d been an idiot. so, when i went home later that evening i said nothing to my parents. indeed, i told no one for fifteen years and have told only a handful of people since then. people i'm glad to say have believed me.
content.summary: I was with three other men. it was daylight and it hovered above a tree across the street.

content.detailedDescription: On august 11, 1976 i was 16 and living with my parents in suffolk county, new york.  hurricane belle had ripped thru the area only days earlier knocking out electricity in the area.  it was a hot august evening and humid.  i was having trouble sleeping due to the weather and decided to go outside and lay on the ground in hopes of falling asleep.  while laying on the ground looking towards the night sky i saw a red orb come zipping out of the southeast and stop dead in the air right in front of me about 20 feet off the ground.  it then executed a series of up and down movements in the shape of a w.  it stayed motionless for a moment before starting the w and after finishing the w.  it zipped off in the direction from where it first appeared.  this orb was about the size of a volkswagen beetle and was near enough to hit with a stone had i tried.  i had no idea what this object was or might be and was left bewildered.  i'd never seen anything like it before or since.  i did not connect this event as a ufo sighting until 10 years later while watching a television show about ufo sightings which included a red orb operating as a probe for the flying saucer.  the rendition of the orb matched exactly what i'd seen that night in august 1976.
content.summary: Saw red orb  come down stop make quick w movement and zip away back where it came from.

content.detailedDescription: I was about 11 year old, it was evening time getting dark,and all my friends in village was together to was tv at our neighbor, remember that it was in village in india, and it was in early 1980s. in whole village there was only few tvs, not in every home so as all my friends and was wathching tv suddenly power went out very common in villages in india, next i very much remember to this day like all kid we start playing and making noises all the sudden i and my friends saw a disc type about with bright lights all around no sound at all above the big tree at our home moved very very slow from south to north i think at the most 40 feet above us, i remember us talking to each other that it not helicopter or plane, some my friends at the time said it is black magic but i do not think it was black magic. the object did not reflect toward us anything or harm us.
content.summary: No sound disc type with bright lights above big tree very slowly moved north at our home in village in india.

content.detailedDescription: My wife took a picture on our way to my sons baseball game and this object was seen in the picture after we looked at it later.
content.summary: Black object above street light in picture taken today

content.detailedDescription:
This event took place way back 0n dec. 14, 1956.  i was 6 years old and my dad and i were on our way to my grandmothers to pick up a birthday present for my mother.  we were driving on rt. 2, just outside od sterling,il. all of  sudden i see this huge black circular object come right down very quickly in front of our car.  i remember looking over at my dad.  the next thing i remember is being at my grandmothers, visiting for awhile and then going home.  my mother asked us what took us so long, which my dad thought odd.  he told her we went right to my grandmothers, visited for about a half hour and then came home.  he said we were only gone for about an hour.  i remember my mother saying "no, you've been gone over two hours".

i never asked my dad about that night, but i've never forgotten it and i talk about it often.  i've heard of people having "lost time" and i think that is what happened to me and my dad.  were we abducted?  i don't know, but something happened that night.
content.summary: Descended in front of our car

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from phoenix back to the reservation and was nearing the end of my trip. as i came over the hill going eastbound on the i-40 near a rest stop, which used to be a place called fort courage, i noticed a light off in the distance toward the cliffs, of the new mexico and arizona border. as i was driving i thought to myself, i have driven through these parts many times, and i could never recall a tower of any on top of the cliffs. my first thought was it was a plane or helicopter making its way to gallup, nm. but as i continued to drive, the ball of light was to low to the cliffs and i continued to observe it and noticed it had not moved nor did the light ever flicker. more like a solid ball of light in the sky. the conditions of that night were light rain here and their, and opening to the night sky through the clouds. being on the i-40, i now that others traveling that highway would have never known that nothing was suppose to be there. i never stop to take a better look at it, knowing i was by myself. i have told my family of the incident and from my father, he has had said the same of an incident long ago, before i was born, while working as a forest ranger out near dulce, nm, he observed from a tower in daytime a solid ball hovering above the tree line. he had said he radio in to another tower near him and gave them the direction of what he was seeing, the other tower said that they don't see anything from there position. it feels foolish to write about this, because my father and i are both marines, and we have both served in wars. he, vietnam and i, iraq. what i observed, i know was not no plane, helicopter, balloon, blimp, drone, or anything i have ever seen.
content.summary: Observed white ball.

content.detailedDescription:
My bother, my son and i went outside to the back yard to have a cigarette and stargaze as we have great views of the night sky here. as we were about to sit down a flash of light caused me to turn to the left in the eastern direction. very low and seemingly above our neighborhood, was a large yellowish/white/orange round object hovering. it was silent and motionless, its size was unusually large for a meteor or satellite or meteorite. it had no tail, no flashing lights. it was solid and very very bright. it was lower than the airplanes and helicopter that was flying in same sky, but far above this object. slowly, it began moving in a westerly direction, then accelerated before stopping again in the west. we were blown away, intrigued. it hovered, the light seemed to increase then go back to normal in slow fades. it rapidly moved again but back in an easterly direction, then it slowly zigzagged northwards. i was astonished. at about where i would guess it was above the river (sacramento river), it made a vertical ascent and blinked out of sight. it moved slow at first, then sped up so fast it was gone before i could raise my hand to point at it.

that night i had very very bizarre dreams. they seemed exactly real. i dreamt of airships by the thousands being fought by cross shaped crafts. end of the world type of stuff. people getting zapped by pink plasma and disappearing. chaos. the waters being manipulated. the dreams were so profound i wrote them down and drew pics of the crafts i saw. i was deeply effected by this dream. still am.

on june 19, 2015 i went out to smoke with my mom and the orb reappeared. this time i said outloud, " wait, let my mom see you.." my mom was in the house getting glasses. when she came out in backyard i pointed to the hovering orb. at this point it had been bouncing around for a solid 5 minutes. when she saw it she sat down and it moved north south, slowly then rapidly then back to the center. she remarked that she would need a glass of wine for this and said out loud ," stay here". it remained hovering until she came back outside. it moved westerly then arced back from the north back to the center where it had been hovering. is a bout 10 or so minutes of this. finally, the object very very slowly went into the east and we observed it getting even lower in the sky. it was already very low. there were several planes above it in the air, not observing, just flying in normal flying altitudes. it gradually just faded out of our site. i was stunned. so was my mom.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Yelowish/white/orange orb appears, hovers then rapidly moves west from se direction, stops hovers moves backwards easterly, then back west again slowly stops hovers then goes due north hovers then ascends straight up and is gone.

content.detailedDescription: Ufo swept into area, disturbed local animal chapter, and swept away.
content.summary: Spotted in grass. aggressively disturbed wildlife.

content.detailedDescription: Camping, looking for t-storms, a star, moved faster than anything we have, my hair stood on my neck from what i saw, ran to tent thought it might of seen me. going up to space or higher space them gone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Light 30 thousand feet high,100 miles out,zig and zig at high speed,to over my head and when strait up and very high and then gone.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside with my friend and dog. she points to this white object hovering across the sky and it stops. the object hovers for a good 5 minutes before continuing its course eastbound. as it headed eastbound we noticed another glimmering object in the direction it was heading. they both hovers and continued to move in different directions around the sky at the speed of a plane before come to abrupt stops. shortly after noticing the second object we came around the third one again exhibiting the same motions as the first 2. this one however kept its distance from the other 2 that were about the distance of my hand to the sky from each other.
i called relatives down the street to have them observe this and they saw the exact same thing i did
a 747 from lax or john wayne was flying towards the 2 close together when they both moved quickly to the right of the plane to avoid being hit.
at this moment we noticed 2 more to the west. these 2 had blinking red and silver lights and flew directly next to each other and synced their path.
2 hours later as i type this they still are in the same general location in the sky. the 2 that were blinking faded and i lost them but the first 2 white glistening objects are still hovered in their spots only moving ever 10 minutes or so.
i was not a believer until today. i can not explain what these are.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4 separate balls flashing and non converged and moved across the sky at high speeds

content.detailedDescription: I was downstairs in the living room on my computer. i noticed the object after my son came running downstairs after he saw it  from his bedroom window and as he looked out the front door acting confused then my husband and i asked him what was going on. he said come look at this. so we went out side and took a look and saw the first object so then we were discussing seeing that first object when i looked to the left at my husband then saw the second object as they were heading from south to north. we were amazed and confused we have seen other objects in the past but not that close, but these 2 object were the closest and we were confused because we didn't know why they were so close to our roof top of our home. the object was a dark matalick disk shape with a dome on top , and it glowed a orange/red. we also could see the propulsion moving as it was hovering to the north they were so quiet we didn't hear anything at all. we didn't get any bad feeling of a threat from the object as it was going over head, we just watched them go about there way.After they were gone we came back in the house and went about our business, i went on my computer and to facebook, posted that i saw 2 ufo's . got messages back saying ya go smoke another joint. so that was very upsetting, and frustrating. you just see some thing and tell people then they don't believe you. it was like the two objects just was floating away until we didn't see them any more.
content.summary: My son came down stairs to alert us that he saw something out his bedroom window.

content.detailedDescription: I was lying in bed and my room was instantly bright then i looked out of my window and a saucer with a lot of lights was just sitting there and i was scared so i hid under the covers and 7 minutes later my room was bright and then the saucer was gone.
content.summary: Bright lights

content.detailedDescription:
While on my first navy cruise aboard the aircraft carrier uss coral sea, cv-43 during a port call to cannes france i partook of a ship's recreation office arranged three day trip to paris.  scheduled to depart at 9am the chartered bus was delayed for a half an hour & set out at 9:30am.  at 11:40am while positioned in a window seat on the left side of the bus i noticed a solid looking, black, shinny, cylindrical object in the air.  just off the side of the road approximately 50ft. & about 50-70ft. in altitude the object wobbled around its central axis at about a 45 degree longitudinal angle in a roughly horizontal orientation.  appearing to be 15-20ft. long & about 7-10ft. in diameter, completely smooth & having 90 degree flat smooth ends.  it first came into my field of view toward the forward end of the bus at about a 45 degree angle relative to me.  with my eyes locked on it from the first moment i followed it until it passed out of view to my left due to the motion of the bus.  i did not hear any sounds come from it due to the windows being sealed & road noise.  my impression was that it was probably silent.  the second i noticed it i instantly knew i was seeing something highly unusual & took care to make a careful observation which lasted about ten seconds.  i was 25 yrs. old, well rested, alert, healthy, felt fine & had normal vision.  the mood on the bus was quiet & calm with many of my shipmates asleep.  knowing that the sighting wouldn't last long i did not interrupt my focus on it in order to bring anyone else's attention to it.  i matter-of-factly told my traveling companion seated next to me & fellow sailor about it who seemed unimpressed.  i did not hear anyone else mention it.  i regret to this day not taking a camera on this trip & therefore i took no photographs of the strange object or, sadly, of paris.  the terrain was flat, semi-arid with about waist high scattered bushes & other low vegetation common to such an environment.  being july the sky was clear & the weather was warm.  there were no trees, phone poles, power lines, etc. present for the object to be hanging from.  

the following is for other experienced investigators to determine:  the location of the sighting would have to take into account the existing roads in 1983 & the most likely route from cannes to paris.  the average speed of the bus i estimate to be 40 mph.  i believe there is a small but remote possibility that the charter bus company & the navy have a record of the trip.  i remember passing either the lucerne or the yoplait yogurt plant on the way out of cannes which may help identify the route.  i remember noticing this because i liked yogurt & still do.  after the sighting i felt privileged to have been a witness to such an unusual thing & thought "cool, i've seen a ufo in france".  this object was displaying anti-gravitic properties as it wasn't moving horizontally or vertically & flight requires thrust combined with lift to overcome weight & aerodynamic drag.  

my strong impression was then & still is that the object was an alien probe.  being a member of vf-21, a navy fighter squadron out of nas miramar, ca, at the time certainly did not make me privy to the latest military or civilian technology (a common misconception) but did provide me with a reasonable familiarity with some navy aircraft.  the object was not a fixed or rotor wing airplane.                        

i would like to know & have been curious ever since if anyone else reported seeing it.  i have relived the moment many times over the years keeping the memory of it fresh.  this report is as detailed & factual as i can make it & the first time i've documented it.  thank you for reading it.  any feedback would be appreciated.
content.summary: U.S. navy man observes black cylindrical object in clear blue french sky on road between cannes & paris july 1983.
